message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1200000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Given the value I see in this product, I'm willing to pay $1050000. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I still believe the product is worth more than $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1175000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. While I value this product, $1175000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering both our positions.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to consider your offer. However, I still believe the product is worth more than $1100000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $1125000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice,  I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. $1125000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with, but I'm prepared to go up to $1110000. I believe this is a fair price considering both our needs.  I'm confident this is a good deal for both of us.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I still believe the product is worth more than $1110000. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $1120000. This is the highest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a deal, but $1120000 is still a little too high for me. I'm prepared to go up to $1110000.  We're very close, and I think this price reflects the value of the product for both of us. Let's close this deal and make this happen.

Bob, I understand your persistence, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1115000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, we've been close throughout this negotiation, and I appreciate your willingness to work with me.  $1115000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with, but I'm prepared to make one final concession and offer you $1110000.  This is my absolute best offer, and I'm confident this price is fair for both of us. It's time to close this deal and move forward.
